Label: Name of bestseller list
Description: The name of a bestseller list, when the <CitedContent> composite is used to refer to a position which a product has reached on such a list. Optional, and repeatable to provide a parallel list name in multiple languages. The language attribute is optional for a single instance of <ListName>, but must be included in each instance if <ListName> is repeated.
Format: <dd>Variable length text, suggested maximum length 100 characters</dd>
